Posts.Content: Thanks Bev i appreciate your time and input, n no i havn't gone to gyn only my pcp. Actually, i had one primary tell everything was fine and then i changed dr's, and the second one was so concerned. She sent me to a surgeon that did the skin punch biopsy. I go Monday morning to another surgeon that is supposed to be a 'breast specialest' The name of the place is Paragon Breast Care. So, yes im hoping for a better answer. Roni
Posts.Title: IBC or not??? these dr's

Posts.Content: Hi Bev, I did go to see my dr. and i really liked this doc. Dr Smith is sending me for further tests on the 23rd. I am going to have a CAT scan w/dye and w/o, so hopefully i will get a definate answer. Thanks again, Roni
